column2: Alpha One to Papa. Alpha One to Papa. Alphonse Farm is cleared and secured. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. We've secured the second objective, Pekela. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Objective Three is ours. So, you can scratch Oss off of the target list. Over.
Alpha Black calling Papa Bear. Beckum has been bent into a pretzel. That was our fourth objective. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Good going. Don't loiter. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha One. Stay mobile. Papa Bear out.
Copy that. Good job, Alpha. HQ out.
Alpha Black, we read you. Acknowledged, Beckum is ours. HQ out.
Welcome back, Alpha team. Your mission is complete. Papa Bear, signing off.
